document.full_text: a new york state judge left intact most of a lawsuit brought by u.s. billionaire len blavatnik accusing jpmorgan chase  of mismanaging an investment account.
document.title: lawsuit against jpmorgan can go forward: ruling
lines_and_colors: a new york state judge left intact most of a lawsuit brought by u.s. billionaire len blavatnik accusing jpmorgan chase  of mismanaging an investment account.
